thread.section_title: Hotel La Sanguine - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location.
thread.title_full: Great location. - Review of Hotel La Sanguine, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: gorbeh12345
title: Great location.
text:
very good location and safe. Rooms are small as most old hotels. no elevators. very good air condition in room.internet nit reliable due to the old structure. you want connection sit in the hallway. eateries and bars close by..mini mart/grocery store a block away.Madeline theater a block away. very close to Madeline subway only 5 minutes walk. walking distance to Concord square 15 to 20 minutes. a lot of high end fashion shops near by.very reasonable price for the location.
Room Tip: we loved our room facing the street with tall windows open to here locals. See more room tips
